trans-unit.source: Provides the default output methods and behavior for tracing.
trans-unit.target: 提供追蹤的預設輸出方法和行為。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener"></xref> class with "Default" as its <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name*> property value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener"></xref>類別與 「 預設 」 做為其<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name*>屬性值。</xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application is running in user-interface mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要將應用程式執行於使用者介面模式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if user-interface mode is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用使用者介面模式;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Emits or displays a message and a stack trace for an assertion that always fails.
trans-unit.target: 發出或顯示訊息，而且一律會失敗的判斷提示的堆疊追蹤。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method sends the `message` parameter and a stack trace to a message box (when the application runs in user-interface mode) and to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener> instance.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個方法會傳送`message`參數和堆疊追蹤至 messagebox （當使用者介面模式中執行應用程式） 和<xref:System.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener>執行個體。</xref:System.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener>

trans-unit.source: The message to emit or display.
Emits or displays detailed messages and a stack trace for an assertion that always fails.
trans-unit.target: 發出或顯示詳細的訊息和堆疊追蹤，一律會失敗的判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method sends the `message` parameter, the `detailMessage` parameter, and a stack trace to a message box (when the application runs in user-interface mode) and to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener> instance.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個方法會傳送`message`參數，`detailMessage`參數和堆疊追蹤至 messagebox （當使用者介面模式中執行應用程式） 和<xref:System.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener>執行個體。</xref:System.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener>

trans-unit.source: The message to emit or display.
The detailed message to emit or display.
trans-unit.target: 要發出或顯示詳細的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of a log file to write trace or debug messages to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要寫入追蹤或偵錯訊息的記錄檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of a log file to write trace or debug messages to.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入追蹤或偵錯訊息的記錄檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Writes the output to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_OutputDebugString" name="OutputDebugString" href=""></xref> function and to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Log%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 將輸出寫入到<xref uid="langword_csharp_OutputDebugString" name="OutputDebugString" href=""></xref>函式和<xref:System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Log%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。

trans-unit.source: For information about the Win32 `OutputDebugString` debugging function, see "OutputDebugString" in the Platform SDK or MSDN.
trans-unit.target: 如需 Win32`OutputDebugString`偵錯函式，請參閱 MSDN Platform SDK 中的"OutputDebugString"。

trans-unit.source: The message to write to <xref uid="langword_csharp_OutputDebugString" name="OutputDebugString" href=""></xref> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Log*>.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入訊息<xref uid="langword_csharp_OutputDebugString" name="OutputDebugString" href=""></xref>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Log*>。</xref:System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Log*>

trans-unit.source: Writes the output to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_OutputDebugString" name="OutputDebugString" href=""></xref> function and to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Log%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, followed by a carriage return and line feed (\r ).
trans-unit.target: 將輸出寫入到<xref uid="langword_csharp_OutputDebugString" name="OutputDebugString" href=""></xref>函式和<xref:System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Log%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，後面接著歸位字元和換行字元 (\r)。

trans-unit.source: The message to write to <xref uid="langword_csharp_OutputDebugString" name="OutputDebugString" href=""></xref> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Log*>.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入訊息<xref uid="langword_csharp_OutputDebugString" name="OutputDebugString" href=""></xref>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Log*>。</xref:System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Log*>
